Junior Sailing

Youth sailing programs and training at Greystones Sailing Club

Youth Sailing Programs

Our junior sailing program welcomes young sailors aged 8-18 with courses designed for all skill levels.

Learn to Sail

  • • Beginner courses for ages 8-12
  • • Safe, supervised instruction
  • • Small group sessions
  • • All equipment provided

Racing Program

  • • Sunday racing series
  • • Regional competitions
  • • National championship training
  • • Performance sailing development

Program Information

Season Dates:

April - September

Training Days:

Saturdays & Sundays

Membership:

€175 per year (Under 18)

Contact:

junior@gsc.ie

Greystones Sailing Club

Ireland's premier sailing club, established in 1937. Located in the beautiful Greystones Harbor, County Wicklow.
